title: Prompt Tricks
excerpt: 1. "Think step-by-step and show your work" The most underrated power move. AI literally gets smarter when forced to explain its reasoning. "I'm stuck on this Excel formula. Think step-by-step and show your work." Instead of random formulas, you get the logic behind each piece. Works for everything from math to business strategy. 2. "Act as a [specific expert] with 20+ years of experience"
